message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth $150 to you. Considering its value and quality, I propose a price of $140 for it. I hope this offer aligns with your expectations.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering its worth to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value of the product to both of us, I propose a price of $135 for the product. I hope this aligns more closely with your expectations while still ensuring a fair deal for me.

I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering its worth to me and the value I'll get from it.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. In light of your latest offer, I would like to propose a price of $132 for the product. This price reflects the value of the product to both of us while allowing for a reasonable profit margin for me. I hope this offer meets your expectations.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $128 for the product. I think this price is a good compromise that works for both of us.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. Considering your offer and aiming for a mutually beneficial outcome, I propose a price of $130 for the product. This price allows for a fair transaction between us and ensures a reasonable return for me. I hope this aligns with your preferences.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still trying to get the best deal. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. I think this is a fair price that works for both of us, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet in the middle.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to propose a final price of $127 for the product. This price offers a fair compromise, ensuring a reasonable profit for me while still providing a good deal for you. I hope this aligns with your expectations.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice, but I'm not willing to go any higher than $125. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying the product from John for $150.
